_header: A Jesu Christ that us is above [A Iesu Crist that ous is boue]
_description: A prayer to Jesus that we may live in such a way as to come to heaven — five couplets

BodDig86.First Lines:
A Iesu Crist that ous is boueFor his swete moder
                    loue…
BodDig86.Last Lines:
…to Wowe God that we moteHounderfongen heueriche
                    bote
BodDig86.Editions:
Silverstein,  Theodore,
                        ed.  
             Medieval English Lyrics.
         York Medieval Texts. London: Edw. Arnold, 1971: 26.
